itunes:title: Episode 630 - Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Contest Champion Joey Chestnut
title: Episode 630 - Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Contest Champion Joey Chestnut
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Hot Dog Eating champion and the greatest athlete of all time Joey Chestnut to talk about the annual Nathan’s Hotdog Eating Contest and how he prepares his body for it, Joey gives his over/under on whe...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Hot Dog Eating champion and the greatest athlete of all time Joey Chestnut to talk about the annual Nathan’s Hotdog Eating Contest and how he prepares his body for it, Joey gives his over/under on whether or not he is going to beat his own world record of 74 hotdogs, Joey gives his personal take on what Takeru Kobayashi is like as a person, and we are still wondering why Joey Chestnut has yet to get a call from a President after one of his wins. Ross tells Joey how much he means to him after Kobe Bryant’s death. Come on Trump. #calljoeychestnut

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros
